scripts package¶

Submodules¶

scripts.sr_driver module¶

class scripts.sr_driver.sr_driver[source]¶

Bases: object

Basic Soft Robotics Gripper Class Wrapper - controls Gripper state machine via received state command and pressure reading from the UR robot itself.

If /sr_gripper receives “closed” system closes, if it receives “open” system opens

codrive_close()[source]¶

close gripper - watchdog timer for pump system = counter value * 1 ms

Returns:none
codrive_open()[source]¶

open gripper - watchdog timer for pump system = counter value * 1 ms

Returns:none
codrive_stop()[source]¶

freeze gripper in current state

Returns:none
desired_state_sub_cb(data)[source]¶

Callback updates local desired state

Parameters:data – std_msgs.msg.String
Returns:none
update_robot_state()[source]¶

Updates the digital outputs on the robot according to the desired state and the pressure sensed via the analog input pins. Relies on the max & min pressures and the current pressure. Decision made based upon current pressure and the current set state

Returns:none
validate_state(desired_state)[source]¶

Ensures that the newly given state is valid. Note: Cap sensitive

Parameters:desired_state – String containing the desired state
Returns:new_state: Returns prior state if invalid desired_state
